languages.text: "Славные битвы ждут меня в любом случае, в твоем ли я отряде или сам по себе. Я лишь пытаюсь предотвратить исход, в котором в одной из этих битв мы сойдемся как враги".
"Glorious battles await me whether I am in your squad or on my own. I am only trying to prevent a course of events that will end with us meeting as enemies in one of those battles."
languages.original_text: "Славные битвы ждут меня в любом случае, в твоем ли я отряде или сам по себе. Я лишь пытаюсь предотвратить исход, в котором в одной из этих битв мы сойдемся как враги".

traits.locale_text: "I will have my glorious battles anyway, no matter if I am in your squad or on my own. I am only trying to forestall a course of events that will end in us joining one of those battles as enemies."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I will have my glorious battles anyway, no matter if I am in your squad or on my own. I am only trying to forestall a course of events that will end in us joining one of those battles as enemies."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Glorious battles await me whether I am in your squad or on my own. I am only trying to prevent a course of events that will end with us meeting as enemies in one of those battles."

traits.locale_text: "Glorious battles await me whether I am in your squad or on my own. I am only trying to prevent a course of events that will end with us meeting as enemies in one of those battles."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Me aguardan batallas gloriosas tanto en su séquito como si voy por libre. Lo único que pretendo es evitar las circunstancias que nos lleven a enfrentarnos como enemigos en una de tales batallas».
languages.original_text: "Glorious battles await me whether I am in your squad or on my own. I am only trying to prevent a course of events that will end with us meeting as enemies in one of those battles."

traits.locale_text: «Me aguardan batallas gloriosas tanto en su séquito como si voy por libre. Lo único que pretendo es evitar las circunstancias que nos lleven a enfrentarnos como enemigos en una de tales batallas».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “荣耀的战斗始终都在等待着我，无论我是与你同行，还是独自一人。我只想让事情不要越来越糟，以免我们日后可能会刀剑相向。”
languages.original_text: "Glorious battles await me whether I am in your squad or on my own. I am only trying to prevent a course of events that will end with us meeting as enemies in one of those battles."

traits.locale_text: “荣耀的战斗始终都在等待着我，无论我是与你同行，还是独自一人。我只想让事情不要越来越糟，以免我们日后可能会刀剑相向。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « De glorieux combats m'attendent, que je sois dans votre escouade ou non. Je cherche simplement à empêcher une succession d'événements qui feront de nous des ennemis. »
languages.original_text: "Glorious battles await me whether I am in your squad or on my own. I am only trying to prevent a course of events that will end with us meeting as enemies in one of those battles."

traits.locale_text: « De glorieux combats m'attendent, que je sois dans votre escouade ou non. Je cherche simplement à empêcher une succession d'événements qui feront de nous des ennemis. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「お前の部隊であろうと、俺一人であろうと、輝かしい戦いが俺を待っている。俺はただ、これらの戦いのいずれかで敵として会うことになるような事態を防ごうとしているだけだ」
languages.original_text: "Glorious battles await me whether I am in your squad or on my own. I am only trying to prevent a course of events that will end with us meeting as enemies in one of those battles."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の部隊であろうと、俺一人であろうと、輝かしい戦いが俺を待っている。俺はただ、これらの戦いのいずれかで敵として会うことになるような事態を防ごうとしているだけだ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Glorreiche Schlachten erwarten mich, ob ich nun Teil Eures Trupps bin oder alleine unterwegs. Ich versuche nur, eine Kette von Ereignissen zu verhindern, die damit endet, dass wir uns in einer dieser Schlachten als Feinde gegenüberstehen."
languages.original_text: "Glorious battles await me whether I am in your squad or on my own. I am only trying to prevent a course of events that will end with us meeting as enemies in one of those battles."

traits.locale_text: "Glorreiche Schlachten erwarten mich, ob ich nun Teil Eures Trupps bin oder alleine unterwegs. Ich versuche nur, eine Kette von Ereignissen zu verhindern, die damit endet, dass wir uns in einer dieser Schlachten als Feinde gegenüberstehen."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Senin manganda olsam da olmasam da şanlı savaşlar beni bekler. Ben sadece o savaşlardan birinde düşman olarak karşılaşmamıza yol açacak olaylar silsilesini önlemeye çalışıyorum."
languages.original_text: "Glorious battles await me whether I am in your squad or on my own. I am only trying to prevent a course of events that will end with us meeting as enemies in one of those battles."

traits.locale_text: "Senin manganda olsam da olmasam da şanlı savaşlar beni bekler. Ben sadece o savaşlardan birinde düşman olarak karşılaşmamıza yol açacak olaylar silsilesini önlemeye çalışıyorum."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
